description: Airing on Tuesday, February 10, 2015: First up on today's show, we'll talk with David Katzmaier, editor of CNET’s TV section, about contextually aware devices and Samsung’s privacy policy. We'll also speak with Amanda Lotz, Associate Professor of Communications Studies at the University of Michigan, about Netflix’s content development strategies. And Chris Danforth, Professor of mathematical, natural and technical sciences at the university of Vermont, joins us to talk about the Hedonometer.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, February 10, 2015
teaser: Airing on Tuesday, February 10, 2015: First up on today's show, we'll talk with David Katzmaier, editor of CNET’s TV section, about contextually aware devices and Samsung’s privacy policy. We'll also speak with Amanda Lotz, Associate Professor of Communications Studies at the University of Michigan, about Netflix’s content development strategies. And Chris Danforth, Professor of mathematical, natural and technical sciences at the university of Vermont, joins us to talk about the Hedonometer.
